N

name - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.objectives.publicobjectives.PublicObjective
 
name - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.WindowPattern
 
newLoginRequest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
Sends a login request to all the players in the game, right after the start of match.
newMatch(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
Adds default players to the game, waiting for username and window from each client.
NewRoundException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.controller
This exception is thrown when a new round starts together with a new turn, to distinguish the event from a simple new turn in the controller.
NewRoundException(int) - Constructor for exception it.polimi.ingsw.controller.NewRoundException
Class constructor specifying the number of the round.
NewTurnMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client
Notifies the player of the start of his turn.
NewTurnMessage() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client.NewTurnMessage
Class constructor.
nextPlayer(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
When the next player is selected, notifies the previous player of the end of his turn, then checks if the now current player is offline, thus selecting a new next player recursively.
nextRound() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.RoundHandler
Increases the round counter and update the list containing the order of turns until the end of the game.
nextTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.RoundHandler
Sets the next player of the round as the current player and handles the start of a new round in case the current one is ended.
NotificationMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client
Notifies the player of a connection-related event.
NotificationMessage() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client.NotificationMessage
Class constructor.
NotificationMessage(String, String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client.NotificationMessage
Class constructor specifying the event and the player.
notify(T) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable
Notify all the observers of a certain event.
notify(T, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable
Notify all the observers of a certain event.
notifyAllPlayers(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Notifies all the players in the match of a certain event.
notifyController(String, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameManager
Notifies the controller of a certain event.
notifyMessage(Message, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Notifies one player of a certain event.
notifyUpdate() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Notifies all the players in the match of a change in the main game class, i.e. a successful move by a player, the start of a new round etc.
